snippet: The Morgan Library & Museum has been given sketchbooks and drawings by Roy Lichtenstein’s estate, including early drawings like “Mickey Mouse I” and “Donald Duck.”
abstract: Carol Vogel Inside Art column; Morgan Library & Museum acquires Roy Lichtenstein sketchbooks and drawings from his widow Dorothy; Spanish visual artist Daniel Canogar plans exhibit Storming Times Square for September 2014; Independent Art Fair plans second event, Independent Projects, which will also be held in Dia Art Foundation's old home in Chelsea; art dealer Dominique Levy will open London gallery.
lead_paragraph: The Morgan Library & Museum has been given sketchbooks and drawings by Roy Lichtenstein’s estate, including early drawings like “Mickey Mouse I” and “Donald Duck.”

headline.main: The Morgan Gets a Gift: A Lichtenstein Trove
headline.print_headline: The Morgan Gets a Gift: A Lichtenstein Trove
